title: Almost perfect recipe for returning to study
creator_credit: Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education, Bruce Shearer and Shane Mulcahy
brief_description: Peter Couchman discusses the problems involved in adults returning to study. Two adult students discuss their experiences and advice is given by a TAFE college student.
